text: Kenneth Holland is a former American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Arkansas Agricultural and Mechanical College—now known as the University of Arkansas–Monticello—from 1959 to 1960, compiling a record of 5–12. As a college football player, he was the starting quarterback for the University of Arkansas during the 1946 and 1947 seasons. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Arkansas Razorbacks football players Category:Arkansas–Monticello Boll Weevils football coaches
title: Ken Holland (American football)
